means: 舒服地坐[躺着]( ensconce的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She looked at Miss Melville, snugly ensconced among her new friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看了看梅尔维尔小姐，她正舒适地安坐在新朋友中间。

sentence.Network_en: Brian was ensconced behind the bar.
He ensconced himself in the closet in order to eavesdrop.
sentence.Network_cn: 他藏在壁橱里,以便偷听.

PerfectNetExp.abs: She ensconced herself in the closet in to eavesdrop., 她藏身于壁橱里 , 以便偷听.

list.abs: We have ensconce ourselves in the most beautiful villa in the south of france ., 我们在法国南部最美丽的别墅里安顿下来.
Carmen finds her father ensconced with a new fiancee and family ;, 卡门发现她的爸爸已经有了一个新的未婚妻和家;
She ensconced herself in the closet in to eavesdrop., 她藏身于壁橱里 , 以便偷听.
He ensconced himself in the chair ., 他把自己安置在椅子上.
old man has ensconced himself in his favourite corner as usual., 老人已经像往常那样坐在他惬意的角落里了.

entry.def: If you are ensconced somewhere, you are settled there firmly or comfortably and have no intention of moving or leaving.

example.ex: Brian was ensconced behind the bar...
She looked at Miss Melville, snugly ensconced among her new friends.
example.tran: 她看了看梅尔维尔小姐，她正舒适地安坐在新朋友中间。
